name: Seal Save!
description:
The first ever full (but kind of short) GBC game from the Dreaming Seal name; SEAL SAVE!

The princess has been taken by some kind of Dark Magic, and it is up to you, a young seal, to save her!

CONTROLS:

A/Z key: Jump

B/X key: Dash (Very essential for some levels)

Start/Enter Key: Begin Game
